articles.title: Boulder police chief gets emotional describing slain officer's heroic response - CNN Video
articles.description: Ten people were killed in the shooting at King Soopers supermarket, including a Boulder police officer, Boulder Police Chief Maris Herold said at a news conference.

articles.title: Photos: Grocery store shooting in Colorado
articles.description: Multiple people, including a police officer, were killed in a shooting that took place Monday at a grocery store in Boulder, Colorado. A person of interest has been taken into custody.
articles.content:
People walk out of a King Soopers grocery store in Boulder, Colorado, after a shooting there on Monday, March 22.
Updated 9:30 PM ET, Mon March 22, 2021

articles.title: VIDEO: People seen lying on the ground inside Boulder supermarket  - CNN Video
articles.description: Video shows a person motionless on the ground inside a Boulder, Colorado, King Soopers supermarket following police reports of an active shooter at the location.

articles.author: Steve Almasy and Paul P. Murphy, CNN
articles.title: Massive police response after gunman opens fire at Boulder, Colorado, grocery store
articles.description: Hours after witnesses said a person came into a grocery store in south Boulder, Colorado, and began shooting, the shopping center was still an active crime scene with a massive police presence and authorities had released few details about what happened.

articles.title: Hate is haunting Asian Americans. Their fear underscores a racial reckoning that is far from over
articles.description: People laid flowers and prayed outside three spas in the Atlanta area while crowds across the country held signs declaring "Stop Asian Hate" in the days after the deadly shootings. Once again, America mourned the killings of people of color.
